Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan get it.
Anyone who wants to leave Medicare like it is, is for letting it go bankrupt.
My mother's 81 and depends on Medicare.
We can save Medicare without changing hers,...
...but only if younger Americans accept that our Medicare will be different than our parents' when we retire in 30 years.
But after all they did for us,...
...isn't that the least we can do?
I'm Mitt Romney, and I approve this message.
